Projects.dialogDescription1: For this project to work correctly, the backend must be running!
Projects.dialogDescription2: Click the 'Code' button and follow the steps to run the backend.
Projects.iceCenterDesc: An ice cream company and shop management app that handles everything from creating a business to viewing the created shop's website.
Projects.iceCenterF1: Creation of companies and retail store networks.
Projects.iceCenterF2: Comprehensive management of the company and its stores.
Projects.iceCenterF5: Login with Tokens and Refresh Tokens.
Projects.trainFitDesc: A mobile app that helps you track and record your progress at the gym in a dynamic and customizable way.
Projects.trainFitF3: Predefined workouts for each training group division.
Projects.guiBankDesc: A virtual banking app that simulates the functionalities of a traditional virtual bank.
Projects.guiBankF2: Withdraw, deposit, and transfer between accounts.
Projects.organoTableDesc: A financial management app to help you measure and track your expenses in a simple, comprehensive, and dynamic way.
Projects.pongGameDesc: Recreation of the classic Pong game with different mechanics, available for 2 players.
Projects.pongGameF2: Addition of power-ups to the game.
